{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WNR1000 |revision=v4 |series=N150 |asin= |fcc_date=07/20/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY314200269 |ic_id=4054A-11200160 |pcb_id=ASK00B-1.6MM |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=0.7 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620N |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3206EM2I-12G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M13S2561616A-5T |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620N |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|G54/N150 Wireless Router}} {{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=WNR1000v4}}
"ASK00B-1.6MM" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2330213 FCC photos] {{See also|SerComm|Netgear}} *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PY314200269 PY314200269], FCC docs note.. :an additional product name of [[Netgear JNR1010v2]] :that this device is likely [[MediaTek]] MT7620N based :802.11bgn 1T1R - 1 antenna (150Mbps)
===Firmware=== Firmware version 1.1.0.32 ([[MTK]] - [[MediaTek]]) [http://kb.netgear.com/29959/JNR1010v2-WNR614-WNR618-JWNR2000v5-WNR2020-JWNR2010v5-WNR1000v4-WNR2020v2-Firmware-Version-1-1-0-32 Download] *[[Netgear WNR614]] - N300 Wireless Router • [http://www.netgear.com/support/product/WNR614 SPage] *[[Netgear WNR618]] - N300 Wireless Router • [http://www.netgear.com/support/product/WNR618 SPage] *[[Netgear WNR1000v4]] - G54/N150 Wireless Router • [http://www.netgear.com/support/product/WNR1000v4 SPage] *[[Netgear JNR1010v2]] - N150 Wireless Router • [http://www.netgear.com/support/product/JNR1010v2 SPage] *[[Netgear JWNR2000v5]] - Wireless-N 300 Router • [http://www.netgear.com/support/product/JWNR2000v5 SPage] *[[Netgear JWNR2010v5]] - Wireless-N 300 Router • [http://www.netgear.com/support/product/JWNR2010v5 SPage] *[[Netgear WNR2020v1]] - N300 Wireless Router • [http://www.netgear.com/support/product/WNR2020 SPage] *[[Netgear WNR2020v2]] - N300 Wireless Router • [http://www.netgear.com/support/product/WNR2020v2 SPage]
